desc: We're an Auckland online plant store specialising in indoor plants, plant accessories, interior décor from a design perspective and NZ Made Ceramics. We sell Hoyas & uncommon plants and we love our products! And we sell Southside Plants Crazy "Keiki Cloning Paste" in NZ. Nationwide shipping from $5.

layout.text:
Welcome to our littlest shop for all things planty and our homemade ceramics :)
Plant mail orders will be sent only on Mondays & Tuesdays to avoid courier delays.
Non contact pick ups for plants and other items are super welcome, please email to arrange a pick up time!
Happy Planting :)
x Itsyleaf
